Articles.Content:
Presenting the:

Starfish!

a revelutionary acrobatic aircraft that strangely enough looks like a starfish!

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34192[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]34193[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]34194[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]34195[/ATTACH][ATTACH]34196[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]34196[/ATTACH]

Take off;

1 out of every 10 times the plane veers sharply to the left on the runway. let it go and pull up.

after your in the air it's somewhat smooth flying. NO SAS!(It was jebs idea)

This Spaceplane requires the fixed camara mod
The space starfish from the duna SSTV are invading. READY THE SRBs!

No, sadly it doesnt work without the mod. I was planning to make a camaera moded version and a vanilla version but after I installed the cameras i cant seem to find them. I belive they are clipping into the wing somewhere. On my next model I will try to fix this issue.
